## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_DROPDOWN\_COLOURED\_DIV property

Whether or not a dropdown field's div should be coloured to match the block colours.

**Signature:**

```typescript
FIELD_DROPDOWN_COLOURED_DIV: boolean;
```
